page.title: 04A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A CHILD
page.content: It is a quarter past eight and I have just woken up, I never feel like getting up. I plod downstairs and eat breakfast. I get dressed. It's 8.25 and we get into the car for school. When we get to school we play until 9.00 then we go into work until about 10.40 and play again till 11.00 then we go in and work again until 12.00. For lunch you can have either a school meal or a Packed Lunch. We have lunch break until 1.30 and go home at 3.30. In the evening we play games: Ludo, Snakes and Ladders and sometimes play our recorders or visit friends, then we have our tea. We watch Television until bed at 9.00.
